traits.Flyby (Air Only): The beast doesn't provoke opportunity attacks when it flies out of an enemy's reach.
traits.Pack Tactics (Land and Water Only): The beast has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the beast's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.
traits.Water Breathing (Water Only): The beast can breathe only underwater.

actions.Multiattack: The beast makes a number of attacks equal to half this spell's level (rounded down).
actions.Maul: Melee Weapon Attack: your spell attack modifier to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d8 + 4 + the spell's level piercing damage.
